languages.text: "Я преподнес тебе подарок. Что ты с ним сделал{mf||а}? Выбросил{mf||а}, не рискнув испытать ни грамма удовольствий, что он обещал".
"I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."
languages.original_text: "Я преподнес тебе подарок. Что ты с ним сделал{mf||а}? Выбросил{mf||а}, не рискнув испытать ни грамма удовольствий, что он обещал".

traits.locale_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."
"I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."
"I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."
"I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

languages.text: “我送给了你一件礼物，可你是怎么对待它的？你满心怯懦地把它丢在一旁，甚至连它的一丝丝愉悦都不敢体验。”
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: “我送给了你一件礼物，可你是怎么对待它的？你满心怯懦地把它丢在一旁，甚至连它的一丝丝愉悦都不敢体验。”

languages.text: 「俺はお前に贈り物をした。それをお前はどうした？投げ捨てたんだ。約束された喜びを一滴も味わえない臆病者め」
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はお前に贈り物をした。それをお前はどうした？投げ捨てたんだ。約束された喜びを一滴も味わえない臆病者め」

languages.text: «Te di un regalo. ¿Y qué hiciste con él? Lo despreciaste. Eras demasiado cobarde para experimentar un solo ápice de los placeres que proporcionaba».
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: «Te di un regalo. ¿Y qué hiciste con él? Lo despreciaste. Eras demasiado cobarde para experimentar un solo ápice de los placeres que proporcionaba».

languages.text: « Je vous ai offert un cadeau et qu'est-ce que vous en avez fait ? Vous l'avez rejeté, tout ça parce que vous êtes trop lâche pour oser ne serait-ce que goûter aux délices qu'il vous aurait procurés. »
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous ai offert un cadeau et qu'est-ce que vous en avez fait ? Vous l'avez rejeté, tout ça parce que vous êtes trop lâche pour oser ne serait-ce que goûter aux délices qu'il vous aurait procurés. »

languages.text: "Ich habe Euch ein Geschenk gemacht. Und was habt Ihr damit getan? Ihr habt es verschmäht, weil Ihr zu feige wart, auch nur einen Bruchteil meiner versprochenen Freuden zu erleben."
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe Euch ein Geschenk gemacht. Und was habt Ihr damit getan? Ihr habt es verschmäht, weil Ihr zu feige wart, auch nur einen Bruchteil meiner versprochenen Freuden zu erleben."

languages.text: "Sana bir hediye verdim. Peki sen onunla ne yaptın? Vadettiği zevklerin bir tutamını bile deneyimlemeyecek kadar korkak bir hâlde onu bir kenara fırlattın."
languages.original_text: "I gave you a gift. And what did you do with it? You cast it aside, too cowardly to experience even a grain of the pleasures it promised."

traits.locale_text: "Sana bir hediye verdim. Peki sen onunla ne yaptın? Vadettiği zevklerin bir tutamını bile deneyimlemeyecek kadar korkak bir hâlde onu bir kenara fırlattın."
